boardgame.name: Ace of Aces: Powerhouse Series
boardgame.description: The Powerhouse Series book set pits the Fokker DVII of Georg von Hantlemann against the SPAD XIII of Eddie Rickenbacker. The game provides statistics for several other WWI fighter planes that may be played using this set._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Powerhouse books include a different variety of maneuvers than was used in the Handy Rotary books making for interesting match-ups between the two sets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

listing.notes: DESCRIPTION: Complete - original edition in slipcase with leather style gamebook covers. Gamebooks excellent with only light signs of use. Slipcase is nice but with some shelfwear/scuffing.

Mint/unpunched not shrinkwrapped. Part of a LARGE estate sale - most of the games are being sold to ONE buyer, some games are being sold to gamers... Shipment will be in mid-late June, when full collection of games is removed from storage. Will accept Paypal - but buyer must pay all associated fees. Will ship worldwide. For shipments in US, game will be shipped priority mail. For worldwide shipments, amount charged will be actual cost.
Boxes have some wear and are in good condition, the books however are in very good condition with minimal wear also includes all the original pamphlets
Small tear and shelf wear. Ask for more description if desired. Shipping outside USA extra.

**private sale to cabalzero** Nova boxed edition - there is a split in the box envelope an inch long along one of the bottom edges. The outside surface is shelf worn. The inside contents are in excellent condition, except the little four page booklet has rusty staples. There is no other water, mold smelly stuff going on, the books are in excellent condition.

Slight damage to the slipcase which has been covered in clear plastic. Some darkening of booklet page edges due to use but booklet edges still sharp. Postage and packing £2.00 in UK, £3.25 elsewhere in the EU. Will ship outside the EU:- please ask for shipping cost.
Game is in good condition. Both books are in very good condition and tables are in good condition. Bos shows some normal wear due to age, but has no split corners or tears.

This is the slipcase edition of the Powerhouse variant of Ace of Aces. Complete with no wear except a bit of shelf-wear on the slip case. One of the rarer editions with the books in pristine condition. A wonderful game-now out of print.
Book covers very slightly scuffed

I have powerhouse series (50.00), Handy Rotary (40.00) and Flying Machines (30.00) or all three for 95.00. Powerhouse and Flying machines complete. Handy Rotary has a handmade sleeve to hold the books, but complete otherwise. All are in very good to excellent condition.

100% complete. Outer box sleeve shows shelf wear. Both books are in very good condition (only minor thumbing on pages). Booklet in very good condition. Smoke free environment. Paypal required for international sale. Domestic shipping $7.00. International shipping determined at time of sale.
Played, but well kept with box and rules intact! Shipping and any insurance at cost. A scan of the receipt for postage will be sent to you by email. Buyer is responsible for package after posting.
The cover is worn (being old and second hand) but the books have been rarely played and are very acceptable.
Some wear to slipcase, but not excessive. Game books in good condition. I will wrap in bubble-wrap and ship in a protective box.
Spad X111 vs. Fokker D V11. Complete and hardly thumbed.
Postage UK £3.00 elsewhere on request
Slight damage on the cover-box, but books and instruction booklet are like new.
